div.l: And vp they gon · and doun̄ ageyn anon
Til that the Miller · sporned at a ston
And doun̄ he fel bakward · vpon his wif
That wist nothyng · of this nyse strif
For she was falle a sleepe · a litel wight
With Iohn the clerk · that waked alnyght
And with the fal · she out of hir sleepe abraide
Help holy crosse · of Bromhol she saide
In manus tuas lord to thee I calle
A wake Symond the fiend is on me falle
Myn herte is broken · help I am but ded
Ther lith vpon my wombe · and vpon myn hed
Helpe Symkyn for the false clerkis fight
This Iohn stirt vp · as fast as eủer he myght
And grasped bi the wallis to and fro
To fynde a staf · and she styrt vp also
And knew thestres · bet than dide Iohn
And bi the wal · a staf she fond anon
And saw a litel shymeryng of alight
For in atte anhole · shone the Moone bright
And bi the light she saw hem both two
But sikerly she nyst · who was who
But as she saw · a white thyng in hir eye
And whan she sa gan sa gan gan this white thyng aspie
She wend the clerk · had wered a volupere
And with the stafe she drow ay nere and nere
And wend han hit this Alayn at the fulle
And smote the Miller · on the pilled skulle
And doun̄ he goth · and cryed harrow I die
